__e: In memory of your father, who I knew so well.
This story shall a good man teach his son. Crispin Crispian shall ne'er go by, from this day to the ending of the world, but we in it shall be remembered.
Just myself... And the memory of my father.

What action do you intend to take if he doesn't come out?

And you took it. Now you've got it. What do you propose to do with it?
Uh, you mind telling me what I'm here for?

Let's remember those who can't be at our Christmas table.
Let us cherish his memory and learn from it the values of tolerance, courage and loyalty.
And, buddy, we intend to stay here.
